forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 1pm. Mostly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 86. West wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 63. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
